p: The Petitioner decree to the return filed in the case matter of of Francis Vanhorn to the writ of habeas Corpus for the following reasons -
1 It does not set forth the character or purpose of the House of the Good Shepherd
2 The return does not state for what purpose for which cause or which time said Francis was placed in charge or custody of the Mother Superior of saud House of Good Shepherd
3d The return does not state any sufficient cause for the confinement of said Frances
4th The return does not set forth any legal ground for the confinement of said Francis

All which is submitted to the Court and asking the Court to adjudge said return defective and for the discharge the said Grancis she has objection to go free or remain in said confinment or she may choose
In the matter of Francis Vanhorn Habeas Corpus
